mapper.sql: article_id, article_chinese, article_english, article_time, article_scan, article_like, article_other
mapper.select:
select
from article order by article_like DESC limit 6
mapper.insert: insert into article (article_id, article_chinese, article_english, article_time, article_scan, article_like, article_other) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleChinese,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleEnglish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleScan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleLike,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into article
article_id,
article_chinese,
article_english,
article_time,
article_scan,
article_like,
article_other,

mapper.update:
update article
article_chinese = #{articleChinese,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_english = #{articleEnglish,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_time = #{articleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_scan = #{articleScan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_like = #{articleLike,jdbcType=INTEGER},
article_other = #{articleOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
